Detailed Description

Test JMA in multithread environment.

Below is the usage examples: The "DICT_PATH" in below examples is the dictionary path, which is "../db/ipadic/bin_eucjp" defautly. 

 Each thread prints its own output.
 $ ./jma_multithread INPUT_FILE OUTPUT_DIR [--dict DICT_PATH] [--num THREAD_NUM]
Author:
Jun
Version:
0.1
Date:
Sep 1, 2010
